text: When King Jabin of Hazor heard the news about Israel’s victories, he organized a coalition, including King Jobab of Madon, the king of Shimron, the king of Acshaph,

<st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="0834 06828">northern</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> who ruled in<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>, in the <st data-num="06160" class="">rift valley</st> <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> of <st data-num="03672" class="">Kinnereth</st>,<n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="08219" class="">foothills</st>, and on the <st data-num="05299" class="">heights</st> of <st data-num="01756" class="">Dor</st> to the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>.

<st data-num="03669" class="">Canaanites</st> came<n id="1" /> from the <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st> and <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>; <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st>, <st data-num="02850" class="">Hittites</st>, <st data-num="06522" class="">Perizzites</st>, and <st data-num="02983" class="">Jebusites</st> from the <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st>; and <st data-num="02340" class="">Hivites</st> from <st data-num="08478" class="">below</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st> in the <st data-num="0776" class="">area</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="04709" class="">Mizpah</st>.

<st data-num="01992" class="">These</st> kings <st data-num="03318" class="">came out</st> <st data-num="05973" class="">with</st> their <st data-num="03605 04264">armies</st>; <st data-num="05971" class="">they</st> were as <st data-num="07227" class="">numerous</st> as the <st data-num="02344 0834">sand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08193 03220 07230">seashore</st> and had a <st data-num="07227 03966">large number</st> of <st data-num="05483" class="">horses</st> and <st data-num="07393" class="">chariots</st>.<n id="1" />
All these kings gathered and joined forces at the Waters of Merom to fight Israel.
The Lord told Joshua, “Don’t be afraid of them, for about this time tomorrow I will cause all of them to lie dead before Israel. You must hamstring their horses and burn their chariots.”

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> and his <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="05971 04421 05973">army</st> <st data-num="0935 05921">caught</st> them <st data-num="06597" class="">by surprise</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04325" class="">Waters</st> of <st data-num="04792" class="">Merom</st> and <st data-num="05307" class="">attacked</st> them.<n id="1" />

The Lord handed them over to Israel, and they struck them down and chased them all the way to Greater Sidon, Misrephoth Maim, and the Mizpah Valley to the east. They struck them down until no survivors remained.
Joshua did to them as the Lord had commanded him; he hamstrung their horses and burned their chariots.
At that time Joshua turned, captured Hazor, and struck down its king with the sword, for Hazor was at that time the leader of all these kingdoms.
They annihilated everyone who lived there with the sword—no one who breathed remained—and burned Hazor.
Joshua captured all these royal cities and all their kings and annihilated them with the sword, as Moses the Lord’s servant had commanded.

<st data-num="07535" class="">But</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> <st data-num="05975" class="">located</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="08510" class="">mounds</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="02108" class="">except for</st> <st data-num="02674" class="">Hazor</st>;<n id="2" /> it was the <st data-num="0905" class="">only one</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="08313" class="">burned</st>.

The <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="0962 01992">plundered</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07998" class="">goods</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> and the <st data-num="0929" class="">cattle</st>, <st data-num="07535" class="">but</st> they <st data-num="05704 08045">totally</st> <st data-num="05221 06310 02719">destroyed</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0120" class="">people</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="07604" class="">allowed</st> <st data-num="03808 03605">no one</st> who <st data-num="05314" class="">breathed</st> <st data-num="07604" class="">to live</st>.
Moses the Lord’s servant passed on the Lord’s commands to Joshua, and Joshua did as he was told. He did not ignore any of the commands the Lord had given Moses.
Joshua conquered the whole land, including the hill country, all the Negev, all the land of Goshen, the foothills, the rift valley, the hill country of Israel and its foothills,

<st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02510" class="">Halak</st> <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> to <st data-num="08165" class="">Seir</st>, <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="01171" class="">Baal Gad</st> in the <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st> <st data-num="01237" class="">Valley</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">below</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st>. He <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> and <st data-num="05221 04191">executed</st> them.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="06213 04421">campaigned</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">against</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03605 0428">these</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> for <st data-num="07227" class="">quite some</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">time</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="03808 01961">No</st> <st data-num="05892 0834">city</st> <st data-num="07999" class="">made peace</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> (<st data-num="01115" class="">except</st> the <st data-num="02340" class="">Hivites</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">living in</st> <st data-num="01391" class="">Gibeon</st>);<n id="1" /> they had to <st data-num="03947 04421">conquer</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them,<n id="2" />
for the Lord determined to make them obstinate so they would attack Israel. He wanted Israel to annihilate them without mercy, as he had instructed Moses.
At that time Joshua attacked and eliminated the Anakites from the hill country—from Hebron, Debir, Anab, and all the hill country of Judah and Israel. Joshua annihilated them and their cities.

<st data-num="03808" class="">No</st> <st data-num="06062" class="">Anakites</st> were <st data-num="03498" class="">left</st> in <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">territory</st>, <st data-num="07535" class="">though</st> some <st data-num="07604" class="">remained</st> in <st data-num="05804" class="">Gaza</st>, <st data-num="01661" class="">Gath</st>, and <st data-num="0795" class="">Ashdod</st>.
Joshua conquered the whole land, just as the Lord had promised Moses, and he assigned Israel their tribal portions. Then the land was free of war.
